sentence: You have someone like Doug Mastriano in Pennsylvania, who is part of his stock and trade and what made him a promising candidate for the Republicans is and what got him Trump's endorsement is his really strong commitment to the big lie, the fact that he went on January 6 to Washington, D.C., and marched toward the Capitol, though he says he didn't go in or he didn't break the law.
author: PBS NewsHour
title: Tamara Keith and Amy Walter on whats at stake in Georgias primary election
